"Save the Shironians!":
"Enemies have invaded the streets of Shironia.
The Shironian defense forces have engaged them.
Everyone, please assist the Shironians."
"All the Shironian warriors have withdrawn. It looks like they're taking refuge for now. This mission is a failure, please return to your regular mission."
"This is some serious damage... Having achieved their objective, the enemies are starting to withdraw. Unfortunately, this mission has failed."
"The Shironian city is under attack. Work with the Shironian warriors and repel the invaders."
"Hostile readings have completely vanished. Nice work."
"Did all the Shironians withdraw...? Whatever, guess we write this off as a failure. Back to your regular mission, people."
"Looks like the hostiles are packing up, now they've achieved what they came here to do. Sorry to say, but this is a failure."
"Waaaah, the Shironian city is being attacked! Please, join forces with the Shironian fighters and drive the enemies back!"
"The enemies have been driven off! Bravo, bravo! That was some amazing teamwork! Thank you all for your hard work!"
"The Shironian warriors have all retreated... Mission failed. Please return to your normal mission."
"Oh... the enemies have started to retreat. It seems they've achieved their goal. Mission failed..."
"Hostiles are present and attacking the Shironian city. Shironian warriors have launched a sortie. All operatives are to work with them and intercept the hostiles."
"Hostile presence readings have completely disappeared. An admirable response to the situation."
"The Shironian warriors have all withdrawn. It appears they are retreating and abandoning this part of the city. This mission is a failure."
"With their goals met, the hostile forces have begun a retreat. The damage to the Shironian city is enormous... Consider this mission a failure."
